sentences.sContent: He transplanted his family to Australia.
He went out to Australia about five years ago.
sentences.sCn: 他大约在五年前移居澳大利亚。

sentences.sContent: ...fields in Australia and washing machines in France...

phrases.pCn: 西澳大利亚州；西澳洲（澳大利亚联邦的一个洲，位于澳大利亚西部）
澳大利亚储备银行（澳大利亚中央银行）
澳大利亚日；澳洲国庆日

trans.tranOther: An island country and continent in the southern hemisphere, in the south-western Pacific Ocean, a member state of the Commonwealth of Nations; population 28,500,000 (estimated 2015); capital, Canberra; official language, English.
